verbose_text: To elucidate the potential regulatory mechanism of miR-370-3p and NEAT1 in sepsis progression, LPS induced RAW 264.7 and HL-1 cells were first transfected with anti-miR-370-3 or anti-miR-NC and the knockdown efficiency was confirmed (XREF_FIG A).
evidence: miR-370-3p and NEAT1 in sepsis progression, LPS-induced
